txt.en: 'We have tracked the smiths' weapons to an ancient library near Mirobel, at Tham Mírdain. Venture forth and find this place. I am sure there are greater mysteries lying in wait within.'
'Find the Library of Tham Mírdain, [placeholder]...it is most urgent.'
The Elves of Echad Mirobel have tracked Angmar's forces in Eregion to an ancient library.
Found the Library of Tham Mírdain
Find the Library of Tham Mírdain
The Library of Tham Mírdain can be found in Mirobel, in the south-west region of Eregion.\n\nOrnras of Echad Mirobel has asked you to find the entrance to an ancient library.
